Quizz Buzz.name: Quizz Buzz
rules: Participants must bring a mobile to participate in the quiz.
Only one teammate answers the quiz using a mobile
Other participants must predict their final score.
No communication is allowed between teammates once the quiz begins.
All the participants will be allowed to look at the questions.

Thinkovation.name: Thinkovation
rules: Content: Include Problem, Solution, and Prototype in one of 10 given domains
Slides: Max 10 slides, any format.
Time : Upto 10-minute limit.
Submission: Email ppt a day before to thinkovation2k25@gmail.com.
Q&A: Each team faces a Q&A session.

Cipher Hunt.name: Cipher Hunt
rules: Each team consists of one or a maximum of two players.
No communication between different teams.
No use of phones, smartwatches, or any gadgets.
No internet access, this is an offline event.
Violating the above rules will result in warnings.
Repeated violations will lead to disqualification.
No in-game hints will be provided.
Physical hints may be given by event organizers at their discretion.
Time limit is 2 hours.
Riddles will be progressively harder, various twists and tricks will be included, leading to the final treasure map. The next clue unlocks only when the correct answer is provided.
The first team to unlock the treasure map, locate the final puzzle, and solve it wins.

Code & Fix.name: Code & Fix
rules: Participants should not talk with other teams.
Participants should upload their prompt and their work.

UX Rescue Showdown.name: UX Rescue Showdown
rules: Each team should spin the wheel only once.
Each team should only use the template that we assign.
Time limits should be strictly followed for each round.
In case of a tie, the team with the most innovative design will win
coordinators: Monika S, Vinisha M, Dharun kumar P

Ctrl Alt Defeat.name: Ctrl Alt Defeat
rules: One member solves a puzzle while other types a given code simultaneously
Both tasks must be accurate and completed together
Both members work together to fix a buggy code snippet
The code must run successfully without errors

Sound Clash.name: Sound Clash
rules: Team can have maximum of  participants.
No participants can be part of more than one team.
It is not necessary that the participants forming a team should be from same college.
There is no restriction on the number of teams from the same college.

Stack It Up.name: Stack It Up
rules: Teams must follow all instructions given for each round.
Players must rotate as per the rules of each round.
No interference or disturbance to other teams is allowed.
Fair play is expected, and cheating will lead to disqualification.
Judges' decisions are final and cannot be challenged.

Silver Screen.name: Silver Screen
rules: Participants must find the answer within the specified time limit.
The story will contain a hidden object or concept that participants must discover.
Only 5 related clues will be given about the story.
Participants must understand the context of the dialogue to translate it effectively.
Dialogues will be selected from popular movies, television shows, or other media.

Fun Frenzy.name: Fun Frenzy
rules: Only the provided object (balloon,cup,straw,ball) can be used to lift, move, or stack the cups hands are not allowed except round 1 and 3
If the object falls, participants must restart from the last successfully completed step.
Participants must complete each task within the specified time limit.
Points will be awarded based on successful completion of each round, with bonus points for the fastest completion.

Pixels.name: Asthra Pixelz
rules: Theme-Based: Capture photos related to the given theme.
Original Work: No copied or AI-generated images.
No Watermarks: Submit photos without logos or text.
Basic Edits Only: Minor brightness and contrast adjustments allowed
On-Time Submission: Entries after the deadline won't be accepted.
